metadata.name: Powershell Base64 Encoded MpPreference Cmdlet
metadata.comment: Detects base64 encoded "MpPreference" PowerShell cmdlet code that tries to modifies or tamper with Windows Defender AV

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('qwrklu1wuhjlzmvyzw5jzs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fkzc1ncfbyzwzlcmvuy2ug')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bzgqttxbqcmvmzxjlbmnli')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('u2v0lu1wuhjlzmvyzw5jzs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nldc1ncfbyzwzlcmvuy2ug')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tzxqttxbqcmvmzxjlbmnli')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ywrklw1wchjlzmvyzw5jzs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fkzc1tchbyzwzlcmvuy2ug')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hzgqtbxbwcmvmzxjlbmnli')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c2v0lw1wchjlzmvyzw5jzs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nldc1tchbyzwzlcmvuy2ug')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zzxqtbxbwcmvmzxjlbmnli'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('qqbkagqalqbnahaauabyaguazgblahiazqbuagmazqaga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('eazabkac0atqbwafaacgblagyazqbyaguabgbjaguaia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bagqazaatae0acabqahiazqbmaguacgblag4aywblacaa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('uwblahqalqbnahaauabyaguazgblahiazqbuagmazqaga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mazqb0ac0atqbwafaacgblagyazqbyaguabgbjaguaia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('taguadaatae0acabqahiazqbmaguacgblag4aywblacaa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('yqbkagqalqbtahaacabyaguazgblahiazqbuagmazqaga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('eazabkac0abqbwahaacgblagyazqbyaguabgbjaguaia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hagqazaatag0acabwahiazqbmaguacgblag4aywblacaa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cwblahqalqbtahaacabyaguazgblahiazqbuagmazqaga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mazqb0ac0abqbwahaacgblagyazqbyaguabgbjaguaia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zaguadaatag0acabwahiazqbmaguacgblag4aywblacaa'))))

output.summary: Detects base64 encoded "MpPreference" PowerShell cmdlet code that tries to modifies or tamper with Windows Defender AV
